name: @versatiles/release-tool
description: VersaTiles release and documentation tools, for internal use

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.doc: npx vrt cmd2md vrt | npx vrt insertmd README.md '# Command'
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run doc
